transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Rajat ji very good evening.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Kaise ho mai Shreya baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan haan bataiye madam.
Executive: Maine kaha sir kya hua bar bar aap complaint raise kar rahe ho aur maine already Abhinav ji se uske bare me discussion kar hi liya tha. Unhone accept bhi kar liya tha ki haan ye cheeze hai. Maine kaha tha sir dekho bhi accept kar liya tha.
Customer: Aapka ye concern tha na ki inquiries abhi nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Nahi mera concern nahi hai agar aap dekhenge to roz ki ek do inquiry aa rahi hai aaj to pata nahi aa rahi hai sir beech me slip ho gayi thi kyuki aap jyada active ho gaye the maine active kara diya tha Abhinav ji ko aur ye bhi bola tha ki sir dekho aapke product me demand kafi hai competition kafi hai aapko active rehna padega apne portal pe tab jaake aapki inquiries badhengi. Theek hai? Aisa bhi nahi hai ki aapko bilkul inquiries aana band ho gayi hai sir abhi bhi daily basis pe agar hum dekha jaaye to ek ek inquiries aapko aa rahi hai. Theek hai?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Ek ek inquiries aa rahi hai sir aapko.
Customer: Ek ek aa rahi hai na to ek ek aa rahi hai abhi 7 November ko bhi aayi hai 6 ko bhi aayi hai 5 ko bhi aayi hai.
Customer: To ek ek inquiry to sufficient nahi hai na madam.
Executive: Vahi baat hai mai sirf bata du vahi bata rahi hu ki maine pura data dekha to maine dekha ki October ke last week me lead me aur November ke first week me sir aap matlab koi bhi by lead ki consumption nahi ho rahi thi inquiries pe follow up nahi ho raha tha. Theek hai? Maine ye kal Abhinav ji ko bataya.
Customer: Follow up nahi ho raha tha.
Executive: Mai aapko data bhej deti hu ek second.
Customer: Nahi nahi aapke paas data kaha se hoga follow up ka?
Executive: By lead ki to mere paas hogi na sir. By lead ki koi aapka inquiry aayi.
Customer: Inquiry aayi humne usko buy kiya.
Executive: Jo relevant tha unko humne quotation diya.
Customer: Theek hai unko follow up kiya meri baat sunte jaiega please.
Executive: Haan ji mai sun rahi hu. Humne unko follow up kiya humne quotation diya humne unse baat kiya.
Customer: To wo hamare record me rahega aapke record me kaise aayega?
Executive: Sir dekho maine bata diya ke through to calling ki nahi humne humne to self calling ki na.
Customer: Ye dekho sir. Mai bhej deti hu aapko ek second. Aapka number mere paas abhi bhi save hai.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul.
Executive: Ek bar aap apna whatsapp kholenge?
Customer: Haan bilkul khol lete hai ji. Dekho ye inquiry sahi ho jayegi sir daily ke basis pe aane lagenge aapko abhi aap active ho jaoge na ki Abhinav ji se maine bataya ki sir daily ke basis pe by lead vagera buy karna kar lo. Theek hai inko lead manager se inquiries pe follow karo sir apni pehle ki jaise beech me aati thi vaise ho jayengi aapko.
Executive: Ek minute ek minute Shweta jara idhar aao to. Ek minute madam hold.
Customer: Ye dekho 19 se 25 October ke beech me zero by lead ki consumption. Madam 19 se 25 Diwali thi wo ho sakta hai usko aap mat ginaiye na wo exceptional hai.
Executive: 26 October se leke 1 November tak zero consumption.
Customer: To kitni inquiries aayi hai jo relevant hai?
Executive: Mai keh rahi hu zero consumption ho gaya sir by lead aapne buy nahi kiya to thodi apni inquiries down ho gayi hai abhi aap fir se active ho jaoge.
Customer: Are by lead madam aayegi koi kaam ki to karunga wo koi Kota Rajasthan se hai koi UP se hai koi portable hai jo ki hamara concern nahi open generator hai usko kaise buy karu mai? Abhi down ho gayi hai na sir inquiries.
Executive: Wo thoda Madam inquiry nahi aa rahi na aap meri baat samjho pehle relevant inquiries aa rahi thi kuch un relevant aati thi magar relevant ki tadad jyada thi agar roz ki saat aath inquiries aati thi to usme se do irrelevant hoti thi paanch hoti thi. To theek tha sab buy karte the ab aayi irrelevant rahi hai to usko kya buy kare hum?
Customer: Sir mai vahi keh rahi hu ab to ye haal ho gaya hai ki ek ek inquiry aa rahi hai. Vahi mai keh rahi hu sir thoda users me gap ho gaya hai jiski vajah se thodi inquiry thodi down ho gayi hai theek hai. Abhi aap fir se active ho jao buy theek hai. Ek minute rukiye aap buy nahi kar rahe kya? Roz kitni matlab ab aayi ek rahi hai to kitni buy kare bataiye na wo bhi to vahi bol rahi hai ki sir aayi ek do rahi hai to wo buy kar leti hai. aa rahi hai na abhi down ho gayi hai na sir mai keh rahi hu ki dekho aapke aapke product me demand kafi high hai agar aap thoda bhi active nahi rahoge na portal pe to apni inquiries thodi down ho jayengi. Are baba kaise active ho aap bataiye kya karna hai portal kholo inka usme se dekho search karo.
Customer: ho gaye na abhi aapka balance ho jayega fir se do teen din se aap rating review maango customer se thoda apne inquiries vagera badhane ke liye. Theek hai aur calls vagera ek bar dekh leti hu answer ho rahe hai ki nahi ho rahe hai.
Executive: Sab answer hota hai madam har call answer hota hai sab hota hai. mai kyu bolungi ki nahi ho rahe hai calls bhi answer ho rahe hai theek hai thoda rating review dekh lena customer se aap maang lena aur just recently by lead jyada buy karo aap sir. Theek hai jo bhi jyada hai to karunga mai vahi to keh raha hu aaye to kare aap baat hi nahi samajh rahe.
Customer: By lead jayengi to karunga ek aayegi to ek to kar hi rahe hai ab aap bhejo na paanch saat to karenge buy. Ab aapne bhejna hi band kar diya to kaise kare hum?
Executive: Ek bar aap by lead ko portal pe jaana ek bar aap. Idhar lao to by lead ka portal kholo to. Kitni by lead tumne nahi kharidi wo keh rahi hai aap by lead nahi le rahe buy nahi kar rahe. Sir maine inko data bheja hai na ek bar ek bar check to karo aap.
Customer: Samne khula hua hai na.
Executive: Batao kaun se by lead humne skip kar di nahi buy ki. 3 kg ka July ka ab ye dekhiye 3 kg ka hum 3 kg me deal hi nahi karte.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Second abhi aaj yahi aaya hai bas aaj aaj nahi aaya. Ha baith jao. Ye Uttar Pradesh ka dekhiye ye Maharashtra ka hai dekhiye ye Punjab ka hai dekhiye laga hua Bhilai Chhattisgarh.
Executive: Ye Jharkhand ka hai dekhiye. Sir aap Chhattisgarh ke filter laga lo ek bar. Aap isme Chhattisgarh ka filter laga do.
Customer: 7 kg generator ki dikh rahi hai Bhilai Chhattisgarh ki Bilaspur Chhattisgarh ki dikh rahi hai 26 minute pehle aayi hui hai. Ha aaj ek aayi hai na 26 minute pehle theek hai. Aur uske niche dekhiye jo baki hai jo Punjab UP ki wo bhi to boliye.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Punjab UP ye sab jo aaya hai Jharkhand vagera wo bhi to dekhiye aap.
Customer: Sir dekho mere paas UP ki bhi dikh rahi hai Punjab ki bhi dikh rahi hai but Chhattisgarh se mujhe paanch nahi sakta na ye to pehle bhi bataya tha. Sir lekin Chhattisgarh se paanch by lead mujhe dikh rahi hai kam se kam wo jo dikh rahi hai wo to aap buy karo. Chhattisgarh me paanch by lead keh rahi hai ek to 3 kg apne kaam ka nahi hai aur aur kaun sa hai jo dikh rahi hai bataiye kaha dikh rahi hai. Raipur Chhattisgarh ki bhi hai but saman best ye to best ki hai aap wala show nahi hua tha abhi show hua hai just 15 kg jo likha hai aur dekho aur kaun sa aaya hai. Korba ka ye bhi abhi show hua hai. Ye sab abhi show ho rahe hai aap baat kar rahe ho to show ho rahe hai abhi tak to show hi nahi ho rahe the.
Customer: Sir aisa nahi hai mai baat kar rahi hu to aapko madam abhi aap aapne abhi bola hai open kiya tab tak nahi tha abhi mere samne aaye ye. Ab dekho na ab aap log kuch na kuch control button daba ke rakhte ho. Aisi baat nahi hai Rajat ji aisi baat aap nahi hai bilkul nahi hai agar aisi baat hoti to aapki company mai apne paas se jaane deti kya matlab apne hi paas abhi tak maine rakha hua hai ki nahi sir ko mai hi dungi service aur mujhe samajh nahi aayi hai ki kal Abhinav ji se maine baat kiya fir maine kaha sir abhi fir se paanch din aap use karo fir aapka balance ho jayega aur mai ye concern close karu fir aapne complaint daal diya ki Shreya madam call nahi utha rahi hai maine kaha are ye kya ho gaya maine to baat kiya Abhinav ji se na ek bar khud hi baat kar lijiye kyuki mujhe pata hai na ki aap use nahi karte ho. wo sales dekhta hai usko thodi hai usko nahi samajh me aata. Achha aap Shweta se Shweta ne call kiya aap usse baat kar lijiye mere se kar lijiye. Hai na ab jo concern dekh raha hai unhi se baat kariye na dekhiye ab inquiries Rishabh ji ne last time mai to shuru se Abhinav ji se hi baat kar rahi hu. Theek hai agreed. Last time jab Rishabh ji ne beech me intervene kiya tha tab uske baad stithi sudhar gayi thi 15 20 din. fir vahi ho jayegi thoda gap aa gaya hai sir 10 din ka gap aa gaya jiski vajah se hamara thoda inquiry down ho gaya theek hai. Aapko mai ye ab aapne theek bola ki aapka inquiry down ho gaya hai. Haan down ho gaya hai. Users ki vajah se 10 din jo aapka band ho gaya na Diwali wali ki vajah se festive season se hamare uski vajah se thoda users down ho gaya iski vajah se hamara thoda inquiry down ho gaya. Fir se balance ho jayega paanch se ek hafta fir se aap active raho Shweta ji active rahengi apna balance ho jayega inquiries vagera by lead to jitni aa rahi hai utni aa rahi hai theek hai but relevant aapka jaise abhi do aayi na teen aayi na aap consume kar lo buy kar lo hai na recently by lead buy kar loge na to apni flow badh jayegi sir aur inquiries inquiries bhi sahi ho jayengi balance ho jayengi jaise aapko beech me aa rahi thi vaise aane lagenge.
Customer: Chalo theek hai ye bhi karke dekhte hai.
Executive: Haan Rajat ji baki baki mai dekh leti hu jo inquiries mujhe matlab mere paas aa rahi hai mai aapko whatsapp pe share kar dungi Shweta ji ka number abhi aaya hai add phone mai inko whatsapp pe add kar leti hu aur Abhinav ji ka number aapko hatana hai remove karana hai to kara do aap bata do. No no hatana nahi hai it should be wo loop line me rehna chahiye. Hatana nahi hai. Theek hai. Ek hafte use karo baat sahi ho jayegi ab bataiye mai concern ye close kar du? Kyuki ye hai ki mere se hi baat karne ke liye rehta hai sir. Suno na madam ek hafte baat karna bhi mat karo. Aur agar aapko jaruri hai 24 ghante me karna hai to alag baat hai. Sir vahi baat hai na 24 ghante me hame karna rehta hai kyuki humne aap se contact kiya ya nahi kiya ya humne aapko to aap usme fir likh dijiye jaise jaise Rishabh ji ne last time dikha tha ki 15 din ke hum us pe period pe hai. Hai matlab conclusion dekhenge kya hai progress likh dijiye ki one week ke liye abhi hum trial period pe hai jo kuch baatein hui aur changes hua aap aisa likhiye. Sir sir aur baki ek bar sir mail pe jayega to fir usko satisfy kar dijiyega no mat kijiyega sir ki mere se baat ho gayi to. Theek hai baki sara catalog score ek hafte ke liye trial pe hai ye. position mai aap tension mat lo vahi likhungi mai catalog score vagera sab sahi hai sab baki sahi hai mere paas jo inquiries aayegi abhi mai Shweta ji ko add karke jo bhi hoga kal parso to chutti hai lekin kal fir bhi mai morning me dekh lungi aayegi na bhej dungi inko whatsapp pe. Theek hai Monday se mai regular basis pe bhejti hu. Theek hai chaliye theek hai ok. Thank you Rajat ji. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries are not sufficient.

- Follow-up on inquiries not happening.



Resolution:

- Executive shared data regarding inquiries.

- Executive suggested being active on the portal.

- Executive will share inquiries on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will use the portal for a week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, portal, follow up, active
